name: Fantasia's Frigate
description:
Embark on Fantasia's Frigate, where everything is not what it seems. In this 3D first-person horror game, players must navigate their way on a mystical frigate while maintaining their sanity and choosing whom and what they should trust in hopes of escaping the frigate before their mind is lost joins the lost crew aboard Fantasia's Frigate. 

This game is currently in an ALPHA State and is set to be completed within the next month. PLEASE READ THE TEXT NOTE IN THE FOLDER

We would greatly appreciate it if you would leave feedback on your playtest session through this link: https://forms.gle/S45NHe9srKVM9uGM6
